rules_text:
When Hand of Fury enters, it gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your fealty to Mountains is five or greater, transform Hand of Fury. [i](Each Mountain you control counts towards your fealty to Mountains.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text2: [i]“Remember that feeling of betrayal. Let your anger become your strength.”[/i]
